notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: M.C.D., M.A., F.N., F.V. and D.P. together devised and coordinated different aspects of the overall study. F.N. obtained X-ray diffraction data. M.M. refined X-ray diffraction data and determined the closure temperatures. A.F. carried out the microprobe analyses. M.F. and M.M. carried out finite difference simulations. M.M., M.A., M.C.D., F.V., D.P. and A.P. collaborated on writing the manuscript and figures were prepared by M.A. and M.M. All authors participated in discussion of the results.
